website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly stereo that offers many advanced features normally found on higher-end aftermarket infotainment systems.
pros: Uses a well laid out interface to provide a more tactile control experience touchscreens can’t deliver
Stereo comes with Bluetooth connectivity for hands-free calling and wireless audio streaming along with voice recognition support for modern iPhone models
The screen is easy to see from a distance
cons: Phone charging via the front USB port isn't always reliable with certain smartphone models

customer_reviews.title: Awesome receiver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Pioneer FHX-720BT 2-Din CD receiver is a awesome upgrade to the receiver I had before. Has lots of great features. I love the Bluetooth feature along with the built-in 50 W amplifier features the best.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had purchased a great unit. It worked well for a little time, but after 3 months the unit started to malfunction. Randomly, while driving, the unit will not recognize the remote control. The display acts up and if I press a button, it immediately switches to showing the info (instead of the few seconds pause). I can only access the settings (any settings) when I first get in the vehicle. If I wait too long, I can no longer access them. Sometimes it randomly switches to seek mode on the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Canada Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great Pioneer 2-din radio
customer_reviews.text: Great Pioneer 2-din radio. Installed the radio into my daughter's 2004 Mercury Mountaineer and looks great in it. Its packed with a lot of great features: Bluetooth, USB wired connection for iPod, AUX jack, handsfree...wow. The radio was installed using Metra 95-5026 Double DIN Installation Kit, Metra 70-1771 Radio Wiring Harness and a PAC SWI-RC Steering Wheel Control Interface. I took my time soldering the connections and hiding the microphone of the handsfree. Very pleased with the install, outcome and the sound quality and features. Way to go Pioneer.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The microphone fits nicely on the left side of the instrument panel One ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and fits well in my 2004 Toyota Corolla CE. I used a Metra harness and the American International bracket. The microphone fits nicely on the left side of the instrument panel One CON- The wires out of the Pioneer harness are a much smaller AWG then the Metra wiring harness. When you crimp, make sure you give it a good squeeze with the crimper then a tug to make sure you got the wire. Metra 70-1761 Radio Wiring Harness For Toyota 87-Up Power 4 Speaker - $4.79  American International TOYK958 Ai Toyota Corolla Dbl Din - $8.77
customer_reviews.author: C Shorter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic radio. Was a b@#$% to map out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic radio. Was a b@#$% to map out the wiring. Wire harness is provided with the unit. Love the blue tooth calling via my car radio. On a side note, it is 5/18/2016, and I am adding this because I have received, I don't know how many umpteen questions asking if this will fit a specific model car. This radio is an aftermarket radio. So unless it specifically states that it will not fit your car, it will more than likely fit your car. Also, if you have to ask me if it will fit a specific model car, you probably shouldn't be installing it yourself. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this radio is great. Bluetooth is fast
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this radio is great. Bluetooth is fast, no sputters, song info is displayed. Colors change and are bright, nobs and buttons dont feel cheap. Menu is easy to read and can be pretty in depth. Settings were even saved when we pulled the battery at one point during the build. Only issues I had with this deck is that it doesnt work well when the top is down (glare from shiny glass) and the display button has to be pressed to switch between song info and the TIME. Which I thought would have been good to have at all times, or atleast a way to cycle automatically through the modes.
customer_reviews.author: KrAzE

customer_reviews.title: Avoid and get something else.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while. Source button stopped working after about 2 years. Then today the volume knob stopped working along with the display. The construction is very cheap and flimsy. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Bizness

customer_reviews.title: I've got an 2001 Acura CL 3. 2 with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've got an 2001 Acura CL 3.2 with Bose sound package. I first bought the wrong harness to bypass the amp 70-1721 (THIS HARNESS WILL NOT WORK WITH BOSE SOUND PACKAGE AS IT HAS AN AMP) so I ordered the 70-1725 Harness which has Amp Bypass. Matched up colors on the Pioneer FHX-720BT connections. One thing to note with that the Pioneer FHX-720BT is that the Blue/White cable that has a blue sticker on it saying REMOTE CONTROL and the thing comes with a remote threw me off! The Blue/White cable needs to have the sticker removed, and connected to the Blue cable on the harness. Once I did that, I got sound... Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Elliot S.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my wife's minivan so she wouldn't have to fumble with her phone while listening to music and taking phone calls. This thing is pretty sweet! The music streaming with Bluetooth sounds great and if she gets a call it pauses the music and rings through the van speakers. She can answer the call from a button on the radio and the callers name shows up on the radio's display. The call quality is excellent on both ends. You can even customize the color scheme, she went with pink lights and a teal display. I highly recommend this if you are looking for something with good quality, plenty of features and an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Does everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Received next day delivery to CA. As for the unit itself Im very happy. Setup is fairly easy with a little reading from the manual. Installation straight forward with wire harness and double din mounting kit for my 99 accord. I installed it in literally 20mins. Features work great, bluetooth easy to setup and good connection. Initial pairing took a while but once paired connects quickly. Built in amp is very adequate even for upgraded speakers. Hands free has very clear calls. Mic has very long wire so mounting is easy no matter where you put it. All in all good buy.
customer_reviews.author: alzeal

customer_reviews.title: The brightness could be a little better for daytime viewing
customer_reviews.text: Connects via Bluetooth to my Galaxy S4 with no problems and plays my music well. Call quality over the included hands-free mic is OK. The AM radio receiver sound quality is lower than expected. Lots of lighting options if that's your thing. The brightness could be a little better for daytime viewing, I ended up disabling the "DIM" feature - if I ran headlights during the day the display was almost unreadable. Definitely cannot beat this radio for $120. Great FM and MP3 audio quality. Good power, don't need any additional amplification for my system, this has plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Doug X

customer_reviews.title: What a Fun choice!!! Good Job Pioneer...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful receiver. Easy to use. Great price. The blue tooth works flawlessly. Interface selections are amazing and plentiful. The phone connection is fast and sound is clear as a bell. The usb is outstanding. I paired it with a sandisk 16gb cruzer "2.0" Excellent! Reproduction and volume is phenominal. Much better than the wired creative zen mp3 player I tried via 3.5 input. "The ultra fit 3.0 will not play." The manual does recommend 2.0. I found out why. You will not be disappointed in this unit....
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: She has made the comment that she is happy that she can be hands free for phone calls ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love's her new Radio. She has made the comment that she is happy that she can be hands free for phone calls and you can have two phones paired at one time. Phone one will be able to use hands free calling and text while phone two will be able to media stream. The LED lighting as to be expected can be quite blinding at night and depending what color you have on during the day, you may not be able to read the display. All in all it's 100% what you would expect from Pioneer both good and bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Good Radio, But Get an Adapter Too!
customer_reviews.text: Good radio, but the instructions should recommend getting the adapter plug. They say to splice the wires into the car wires, which is a HUGE mistake. Instead, go to Crutchfields and find the adapter plus you splice in, which can be done in the house, then it plugs in to the original car's plug. You can swap it in and out if you want to sell it with the original radio. The only complaint with the radio is that the brightness maxes out at 10, which isn't as bright as I'd want, but otherwise really nice sound. I bought adapter Metra 70-1721 Wiring Harness for 1998-2005.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Sue

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems to be fully functional and sounds fantastic. The hands free headset works well with incoming ...
customer_reviews.text: After having an older Alpine receiver for a while, then having it stolen, and having to return back to a stock deck and speakers this receiver was a dream. For some reason it took several sync attempts before the blue tooth finally hooked up to my android phone, but, once it connected it's solid. Everything seems to be fully functional and sounds fantastic. The hands free headset works well with incoming calls.....still working out the bugs for outgoing. Overall I'm super happy with the price and features to replace the stock sound. I'd highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: this game is soooooo awsome. love the way they have the players real first name!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good radio at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I originally picked up this stereo at Best Buy, and installed it into my Wife's '02 Explorer. I ended up liking it so much that I picked up another one to install in my '03 Focus that was 20 dollars cheaper here. I love the option to be able to change the display colors to whatever you like. The hands-free and Bluetooth options are so liberating. Works pretty good with iPhone 4s. Siri can be addressed although the wait time to get her to listen is a little long. There is more than enough microphone wire to mount the microphone pretty much where ever you want.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Can't mute the MIC during a call. (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: It broke exactly 2 days before the warranty expired. They wanted me to raise a case so Pioneer can analyze wether to honor it or not. I'm currently in Mexico so no local Pioneer dealer here, in short I'm screwed. I like what i got for a good price. The only thing i didnt like is that you can't mute the mic while in a call, you only have the option of muting the entire call so you can't hear them and they can't hear you. It seems that the only option is to mute the mic directly in the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Mejia Gtz

customer_reviews.title: Prefer something else
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The stereo looks nice in the car. I like having the different lighting options. The remote can come in handy a lot. I love having Bluetooth and an aux port in my car! Cons: It is very difficult to see the display in the day even with the brightness turned up. There is not a scanner for radio stations which is quite annoying. I wish it had bought a stereo with two knobs instead of just one. It would be much easier for navigating to different stations. Overall it is a decent stereo but nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Once we got this installed in my 2000 Ford Explorer, it has been amazing! I love the fact that you can set it up where the light either changes or stays on the same color. While installing, my husband had to cut on the frame of my radio holder to make sure it fit, but other than that no complaints. I have it on the Bluetooth audio and it will automatically start playing my music or my book, whichever app I have left open, I love this setting!
customer_reviews.author: Red.Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Great reciever with amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this radio in my 2004 Ford F-150 to replace the stock unit. When using the installation kit that is purchased separately, this unit looks as good if not better than the factory unit. It does install flush and took me about 30 minutes to install it. I use my Galaxy S3 to play music using a bluetooth connection. The audio is amazing and sounds better than the original factory head unit. I haven't even scratched the surface of the capabilities of this reciever but I can honestly say that I am extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but be prepared to re-wire
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio, although reconnecting all the wires is a pain, it also does not support my cars subwoofer. IMPRESSED with the Bluetooth capabilities: it automatically routes incoming calls though the car speakers and automatically starts playing music from my phone's (android) spotify account. It can also lookup caller information and you can call any of your contacts without touching your phone.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully. Bluetooth cuts in and out once in awhile
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. Bluetooth cuts in and out once in awhile, which is why i only gave 4 stars. other than that, the unit has many cords coming out the back so it is a bit of a squeeze. Lights up well, connects easily, nice features. Update 6/14/15 ordered begining of december. It now cuts off music completely from bluetooth every hour or so. Really annoying. Updating to 2 stars from 4.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: it was super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, to my 2000 Toyota Solara, it was super easy to install, basically just match cords color to my car inputs, the sound is very good, the blutooth is working perfectly, i also connected the speaker mic that came with it on the sun shield, it working just perfect. i can't imagine why with this price of ~105$ any one will buy anything else for his car, unless he is extreme music lover or something, this module work perfect with my 4 speaker, 2 tweeters, and my insane SUB on my trunk. worth every dollar and more
customer_reviews.author: harelfrish

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2007 Pontiac Vibe with Monsoon System
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my 2007 Pontiac Vibe with Monsoon system, and it works like a charm. One of the main reasons I bought this was to add Bluetooth capabilities to my vehicle. I have two cell phones - one for work and one for personal use - one is an iPhone and one is an Android. This radio lets me connect both via Bluetooth. The sound is great with the stock speakers, I'm completely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer FH-X720 BT installed in my 2009 Toyota Tacoma
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great radio! It has so many great options that let you customize it just how you want it, including color combos, advanced EQ options, integrated subwoofer options, as well as many others! I had a problem with the auxiliary port that came with my truck-the volume limit was incredibly low. This fixed that problem and now It gets so loud, im considering buying new speakers to match! The phone option and microphone that comes with the radio are also great. Every time I speak with someone they say that I sound as if I have the phone directly to my mouth. No cons as of yet; I have had it for about a month!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Solid budget 4 channel receiver with USB/iPod functionality
customer_reviews.text: This radio is very solid for the $115 asking price. iPod functionality works great, and radio reception is nice and clear. The only reason that I ding it one star is that the operation through the on screen controls and menu function are not particularly intuitive. I had to spend 20 minutes showing each of the other two family members in the house how to operate it. I'm an engineer and they aren't... however, it's pretty small negative considering how inexpensive the radio is and how easy the installation was.
customer_reviews.author: J. Page

customer_reviews.title: This is the radio to get if you are looking at it.
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie...I was worried. If you have a Nissan Altima and want a new stereo this is it. I couldn't be happier, Bluetooth synchs up right when I get in the car. Even seamlessly goes between USB and if a call comes in the bluetooth picks it right up. You need to get the 2 Din Altima pllastic kit and wire harness, then it seriously plug in and play. Amazing choice.  --- 2 Din plastic and wire harness.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Smith

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great! Plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: An upgrade for my 2006 Jeep Liberty. I purchased an adapter to integrate with the steering wheel controls. I purchased the suggested wiring harness adapter also. The jeeps have a 1.5 DIN mounting space...so I had to do some cutting to get the 2.0 DIN unit to fit. It sounds great! Plenty of power, clear sound quality, and incredibly flexible. Plays CD's, USB, and can stream from Android. Install was easy. Blue Tooth for hands free calling works well. All in all...best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: D. Good.

customer_reviews.title: Easily updates the technology in my old car
customer_reviews.text: Updated my 2004 Saturn ion 2 to today's technology! Bluetooth hands free talking! Bluetooth music streaming. Charges and plays by iPhone. Let's me connect my personal iPhone via the charging cable and also connect my work iPhone via Bluetooth so I'm always connected! Easy to install. I did it myself. My first time installing a car radio. Just need a double din dash kit and a wiring harness. I ordered an antenna adapter but the pioneer didn't need it! Makes my "beater"/work car fun to drive
customer_reviews.author: thrill5one6

customer_reviews.title: Install was quick and easy with a little help from youtube
customer_reviews.text: Install was quick and easy with a little help from youtube. I recommend the wire harness from Metra if available for your vehicle, the color coding is simple. Sound quality was immediately improved even with stock speakers. Bluetooth syncs to Pandora right when I turn the car on without touching my phone as long as app is open. I haven't tried to use the mic yet, but so far it's great seeing the name of callers pop up there on the screen and the colors are cool. SUCH a great deal for the price, much cheaper than Crutchfield. 100% satisfied with looks and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Caseyb

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Replaced aging older stock deck in my SUV. Love the Bluetooth connectivity. Wish the dim setting was easier to get to, and easier to switch from just high to low for day/night driving. High is REALLY bright and low is REALLY low. Remote is a nice touch, but honestly who uses a remote when they're driving?
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the radio in a 2005 Ford Explorer. Fit fine but you need to by the mounting bracket, face ring and cable conversion. Those were a major problems because Amazon says almost every thing fits, and obviously they don't all fit. The cable has to be spliced in and the other two items must be specific to the vehicle. After the hassle with those items the radio works great. The phone part works exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: CarlS0525

customer_reviews.title: Great deck, lots of color options
customer_reviews.text: Great deck, lots of color options. I like the large volume control knob as well as the large display. Using the Mixtrack function is a bit of a hit or miss, with lights and it's random track selection, but setting for those can all be adjusted. Look svery nice with a blue button/green display color combo. Works great with bluetooth and through the usb. Very sleek looking deck, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Supernova

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the stereo
customer_reviews.text: Awesome system sounds great, microphone is good, lighting options are cool. only thing i don't like is that it can't display the song info for Spotify Running the microphone was a pain
customer_reviews.author: vlad

customer_reviews.title: Very good product from Pioneer.
customer_reviews.text: This works very nice in my Mazda MPV. Looks great, works well with my iPhone, charges it while it plays. Just plug the phone in, and it automatically starts playing. I like that it also has an app function that will open up an app like Pandora when you plug it in via USB. Over bluetooth it also works, and you can leave your phone in your pocket. Comes with a nice microphone and plenty of cable to route the mic to whereever works best.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Fit and 03 Escape nicely
customer_reviews.text: It fit good, all I had to do is remove about a 1/4" of plastic along the top of the dash behind the black trim. I used this mounting/trim kit and it fit nice on my 03 Escape, Metra 95-5817 Double DIN Installation Dash Kit for Select 1995-2008 Ford, Lincoln, Mercury, and Mazda Vehicles
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor AM reception. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Besides the Bluetooth and fm radio functions I listen to 2 AM radio stations here in So. Fl. 560 and 610. This radio didn't receive either worth a darn. Remover radio and double ckd antenna connection. Its ok. Went through radio functions and double ckd local/distant settings for reception. All set correctly. Still no joy. It will receive some AM stations but not the ones I need.. Radio was returned for refund..
customer_reviews.author: Slapshot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, kind of looks like it's from a sci-fi made for TV movie though
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. The portion of the installation that involved this head unit could not have been simpler. The features on this thing are incredible. The hands-free calling works flawlessly. The USB ipod detection is surprisingly fluid. The only down-side is that it kind of looks like it belongs in a cheap spaceship. I'm okay with that
customer_reviews.author: ShereTop Contributor: Anime

customer_reviews.title: Works great, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sounds great, good price. Connects with iPhone right on start. Nice to be able to adjust the color. For a 2005 (should be the same as 03 04 05 06 07 08) Matrix, I ordered the Metra 70-1761 Radio Wiring Harness For Toyota 87-Up Power 4 Speaker to wire it in. I soldered the wires and wrapped them in heat shrink. All the wires are color coded so it was easy. You can also use crimps. Then I ordered Metra 95-8202 Toyota DDIN Multi Dash Kit to fill in the gap on the sides. The OEM radio is slightly wider than a standard double din.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this head unit! Super simple to install! Didn't take long at all. Love the customization options and settings. Only issue I've had so far is bluetooth phone calls. Audio wasn't seeming to play through the speakers. Bluetooth music works seamlessly, though. UPDATE: I figured out the issue with my phone calls. It all works perfectly now! Highly recommend this unit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is really easy to install and very simple to operate. I installed it in my F250 in about 30 minutes, if you buy this unit I would recommend you find the wire harness that matches your vehicle and purchase it at the same time. I bought this with the harness and mounting kit and it was plug and play. The color options on the display are cool and the Bluetooth works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Clark

customer_reviews.title: radio and blue tooth works good and would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters 07 Kia Optima. Since I also purchased the wiring harness & dash kit with the same order, the install went well. The radio face is not flush with the dash cover but that may be because I did not pick the right screw holes for the mounts. Over all, radio and blue tooth works good and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is great. The instructions are very easy to follow and although the unit didn't fit perfectly, once I purchased an installation kit it fit great. I had to get creative because the mounts that it required for proper install didn't mate up with the mounts in my wife's 2004 Mazda Tribute. This unit includes the hands free speaker as well as a remote control. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schaff

customer_reviews.title: Just an awesome receiver. love the programmable colors
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome receiver. love the programmable colors. The Bluetooth is easy to set up and use. The microphone works very well too. I have two twelve inch sub woofers hooked up to it and the controls in the settings on the receiver made it easy to get them sounding perfect. Fits in my 2009 Kia Spectra with Metra 95-7330 Double DIN Installation Kit.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radio
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Radio, installed in my Exterra. Hands free phone works and sound great. Easy to install and setup. Bluetooth works fine as well. Well worth money. Sounds great too
customer_reviews.author: jerry yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: THIS DECK IS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is an Amazing unit for the price, i am older now and over the tv while driving thing, i simply want great sound and a "factory low key" looking deck that is affordable, sounds great, and allows me to stream Pandora from my Bluetooth system in my android phone and I have USB sticks with tons of songs i love. This unit provides all of that and then some! And the orange illumination matches the interior of my vehicle PERFECTLY! This is a GREAT DECK THAT IS HARD TO BEAT AT ANY PRICE!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Martin

customer_reviews.title: One for, One against
customer_reviews.text: This was put in my husbands car and he likes it thus the 5 stars. I, however, do not like it. To turn off the radio you push the button and if you have something in the CD slot that will start playing and you have to push the button again. Guess I am looking for something more straight forward. It does play nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cabincreek

customer_reviews.title: Attractive replacement CD receiver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this CD receiver at a very good price to replace the stereo the thieves permanently borrowed from my convertible. It actually is a perfect fit for my dash, but paranoia has kept me from having it installed. It is a beautiful unit. So far, I fear that it would be too tempting for a thief to ignore. I am sorry that I cannot say if it sounds as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Polarbeardr

customer_reviews.title: This receiver is SO sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is SO sweet!!! It has EVERY option. Bluetooth, Ipod, auxiliary. I have my old 60gb ipod connected.. I can connect my S4 to the receiver and use the music on my phone, stream pandora, send/receive phone calls (it comes with an external microphone) I couldn't be more pleased with this product. I would buy this again in a heartbeat!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Fraysier

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit for a good price. I have a FHX-700bt in another vehicle and like it except for the Dimmer function, it is too bright at night. But that issue has been corrected on the 720 model . It is great! There are multiple dim levels which make it easy to find the right brightness, day or night. With Bluetooth, handsfree calling, USB and Aux inputs, what more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Tony T.

customer_reviews.title: awesome radio
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio for the cost. Mainly purchased to stream music through Bluetooth and make calls with Bluetooth. Easy to install. I used to radio adapter and steering wheel control adaptor. I would recommend assemble wire harness before installing and having butt connectors or saudering system. Very customizable, excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works great. Super long MIC cord. It also has a cd player and a lot of other fun features I have yet to find. Perfect upgrade for my wife's car. For $100 this was a great way to add all the modern features you need in your car while being able to hold onto the old ones like iPods and cds.
customer_reviews.author: beau thornburg

customer_reviews.title: So I really love this stereo
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So I really love this stereo. It was really easy to install. I love the changing colors. I haven't used all the functions, but the ones I've used were easy. The only problem I've encountered is that the Bluetooth has been shotty. So, if you're looking for a solely wireless connection, it may go out or become intermittent.
customer_reviews.author: .nicole.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Having bluetooth has been a dream come true, what's Radio?' The colors are bright, very sexy... I actually have it set to Red full time, balances the best with not being too bright at night. Quality wise, it's been solid, only lost connection twice since I've owned it, 1 year now, just restart the car and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Pump it up!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate, sounds great, works well with all my Bluetooth devices, and the telephone audio is better than the factory installed audio in my new Volkswagen. AND the wife loves that it can change to all sorts of colors (aka "bling" factor). What more could you ask for in an after-market radio at this price?
customer_reviews.author: Cholla Boy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Car Stereo for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is awesome! Can't believe all the features this radio has for such a low price. Installed it myself in an 05 Tahoe using a Metra dash kit and an Axxess wiring harness. Works flawlessly. Blue Tooth synced perfectly with my android, hands free mic works great. Displays whatever music you are playing whether ipod, radio, usb or pandora. Controls all media from radio or remote.
customer_reviews.author: Tribute

customer_reviews.title: where the controls are a little better. I'm really happy with the Bluetooth capabilities
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stereo for about a week now. My original plan was to ditch my iPod for a USB flash drive or two. However, the options for browsing files on the drive is a pain in the butt, and I might be able to fix it, but it would require me completely reorganizing all my music. Instead, I use my iPod via USB, where the controls are a little better. I'm really happy with the Bluetooth capabilities. My phone paired once and I've had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric No Front Brakes

customer_reviews.title: Great sound boost
customer_reviews.text: Great little stereo. Installation was super easy and the features are your standard everyday stuff. The Bluetooth and microphone are a great feature and makes life so much easier. The microphone is clear and crisp. The remote is very well made. Great buy for someone looking for something cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ryu

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive radio
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my son's car. The display is very hard to read in the daylight, but looks great in low light. My son loves the dj mix feature (I don't remember what Pioneer calls it, but it takes songs off your iPod and plays part and then changes to another one with a similar beat). Great price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maline

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful stereo and did not cost me an arm and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful stereo and did not cost me an arm and a leg. I love the pioneer brand and since I needed to replace the stereo in my 2005 Chevy Express van this works perfect. This has everything that I could want in a stereo. The Bluetooth works great and the installation went quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Lathwell

customer_reviews.title: Great car stereo with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install with wiring harness I purchased separately. Fit and finish is nice. Bluetooth works great for hands free talk. This was the main reason I bought it. Totally compatible with my iPhone 5S and iOS8. The USB port charges my phone and the illumination was customizable to match my car. Overall, really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a really great deck. Absolutely worth the money. PROS: Bluetooth connects flawlessly with my Android phone. Aux, CD, Radio all work well, too. Installation was straightforward, looks great installed. CONS: The only issue I have with this stereo, and the reason for 4 stars rather than 5, is the high frequency noise. It's not too obvious, but when listening to the radio or bluetooth, there is a constant high-pitch sound. The manual recommends installing a specific filter, but I haven't had time to try it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: The features and sound output is excellent. It has been only couple of days so ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not get all the rave reviews for nothing. It took less than hour to install it mostly crimping wires together to create the connector. I used Metra 70-1721 harness. The features and sound output is excellent. It has been only couple of days so I will know more in coming weeks and months.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Depp

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this head unit and I have 3 varations of this some Pioneer mix track Head units. Easy to connect to blu tooth, love the mix track fiture with usb music. this is a very easy menu options and nice adjustable EQ. very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ripitywitt

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Product was not exactly a direct fit as some shaving of plastic was required, but the dash kit that I purchased at my local audio store was a perfect fit once the alterations to the dash was made. That's why i'm giving it a four. Sounds great with my Pioneer 6x8 speakers that I bought before. Great output and way better than the stock set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Nice little device for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options for adjusting bass, treble, etc.... almost too many options! Bass boost, subwoofer control, loudness, equilizer.... Easy install into 08 4Runner with many adapters. So far, so good! I do enjoy the hands free phone and streaming bluetooth for music!
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: It produces a great sound, but you may find that it overpowers ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace the factory stereo in my Toyota Tacoma, my requirements were a double DIN stereo with bluetooth, aux-in, and usb. This stereo fit my requirements perfectly at an affordable price. Navigating the settings menus is a bit confusing for me initially, but I have since figured it out. It produces a great sound, but you may find that it overpowers your factory speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B. Hudgens

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stereo for the money. Paired easily with my iPhone 6, streams Pandora and handles calls in/out without any issues so far. Had to get a little creative with the Metra 95-5026 mounting kit on my '03 Expedition, but it all came together eventually and not the radio's fault. LEDs are cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kris McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome stereo, especially considering the price. Worked flawlessly with my Android phone via Bluetooth. Has all of the features you would expect, plus support for controlling Pandora running on your phone (including thumbs up/down, changing the station) from the head unit. This doesn't come with any installation pieces, so you will need to buy a full installation kit yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great headunit
customer_reviews.text: I have own several Panasonic products in the past with great experiences. This one is the same...very easy to operate and use. Sound quality is great especially with quality speakers which I am running Rockford Fosgates all around. Bluetooth works flawlessly and telephone mic works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Roy

customer_reviews.title: Everything works great with this head unit
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great with this head unit, and I really liked how you can customize the colors to match your cars interior lights. Put this in my 05 tacoma. My only complaint is that the screens lettering isn't bright enough to see during the day, at least in my truck with the "amber" color display. This isn't a huge deal for me though because I mainly use the BT steaming and just look at my phone for selecting music
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: read many reviews about this before i read it. this thing is amazing. it can change to about any color. comes with a remote control and a microphone for hands free calls. the user interface is very easy and intuitive. it works so well and is very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: CristianG

customer_reviews.title: Has been great for me
customer_reviews.text: Has been great for me. A little extra installation for the Bluetooth mic but the stereo works and looks great in my 2006 Subaru Forester. I like have the option to charge my iPhone while driving or just use Bluetooth. Finally the screen brightness is great. I have had pioneer receiver before that were unreadable during the day, but I pumped the brightness up on this one and it is visible day and night.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Best audio deal around
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, installs easy, sets up super easy, Blue tooth and mic works flawlessly once you find a good spot for it (and i have a loud exhaust in my car) I also purchased a low profile SanDisk ultrafit 32gb usb thumb drive and its almost flush with this unit, I just took my MP3 collection and dropped it on the thumbdrive and it shuffles through all the folders with zero delay. great stereo would buy again and definitely recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: disparel

customer_reviews.title: This is a great radio for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radio for the price. blue tooth works great. Illuminates very well in the daytime and dims when lights are turned on. With the right harness that I managed t get when I bought this, hooking it up was a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy McGough

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, top notch like all Pioneer products but the equalizer doesn't include treble or anything to make the voice stand out. Only high and low pass filter which is awesome but unnecessary if you have an amp installed which is supossed to already have this.
customer_reviews.author: berlin

customer_reviews.title: Poor daylight display visibility
customer_reviews.text: Great features EXCEPT poor daytime visibility of display on brightest settings, which negates much of the positive aspects of this device. Didn't know until after received car back from installation paid through Amazon (installer was fine). Have used for four months, and would have returned it for the lousy display, but the extra installation costs just add to the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Danek

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect in almost all aspects except at times the Bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 4.5 stars. Works perfect in almost all aspects except at times the Bluetooth connection has errors connecting to the Pandora setting. It will still connect promptly to the Bluetooth Audio setting and play Pandora music that way but then you cannot use the radio to navigate Pandora settings, it's just a slight inconvenience at times.
customer_reviews.author: Swift Saga

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions, great receiver
customer_reviews.text: A lot of receiver and features for the money...sounds great. It was a bit tough to figure out what was needed to install this in my Chevrolet truck, and the installation instructions along with the set up instructions are some of the WORST I have ever had to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth phone & music integration!
customer_reviews.text: Hands-free call quality is excellent. I mounted the included microphone at the top of the A-pillar (i.e., upper-left corner of the windshield). I also installed the Axxess ASWC-1 steering wheel control interface. All of the steering wheel controls in my 2005 Toyota Camry function exactly as they did with the factory stereo.
customer_reviews.author: DMannnxx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car stereo!
customer_reviews.text: I've installed two of these headunits. One in my car and one in my mom's. They are a great value for the money. Lots of features and decent looks at a great price. I would definitely recommend this radio for low-mid budget installs, not high end.
customer_reviews.author: XShadowHazeX

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Mostly plug my iPhone into the USB ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Mostly plug my iPhone into the USB so I can get the Mixtrax visuals. Everything worked flawlessly right out of the box. Cons: Wish Mixtrax would work with iPhone via Blue Tooth. Also, the gauge of the wires supplied with the harness is way too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stereo for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stereo for the price! Installed it in a 2007 Hyundai Entourage in less than 1 hr with a Metra 95-7323 double DIN installation kit, and a Metra 70-1004 radio wiring harness. Bluetooth works great. I put the mic on the top of the steering column, no background noise. The Pandora app is sweet! It made the stock speakers sound better than they ever have, and it looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great headunit. Simple design
customer_reviews.text: Great headunit. Simple design, bluetooth pairs well, easy install into a 2005 Subaru Forester. Price was right too. Best part is neon-electro-strobe seizure mode when you get an incoming call. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: ebelements

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It was here on time love it ... I put it on my Chrysler 300 touring 2006... But be aware you need to buy the cable , chip, and a new face peice plus intaliation it can up to 300 :( so you either no how to do it or have money
customer_reviews.author: sucely mendez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value in this price range
customer_reviews.text: My past experience has been Pioneer headunits are easy to setup and provide excellent sound quality. This unit was no exception. An excellent choice in the lower end price range. This headunit replaced a Pioneer touchscreen with navigation that I'm moving to a newer car.
customer_reviews.author: James Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy. Bought for my2003 Ford F150 Lariat. Easy install (purchased all accessories such as the wiring harness through amazon as well). I researched a lot and glad i picked this one. I saw some people complain about the brightness, i noticed this as well, however there is a "brightness" option in the settings folks. Also, thought i needed new speakers for my truck, but this radio drastically improved the quality of sound of my speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great radio.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful head unit. Great price fi all the bells and whistles. Fast delivery. Easy intstall. Bluetooth hands free cell phone works perfectly and clear. Just as good as factory head units with hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Reef

customer_reviews.title: the phone call quality is really good. buy it if you considering it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my girlfriend can't talk on the phone or even use a phone at all while driving ; This fixes it all ; charges the iPhone ; controls pandora through unit and offers bluetooth calling . the phone call quality is really good . buy it if you considering it .
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice double din replacement for 2001 Sequoia stock stereo
customer_reviews.text: NIce replacement head unit for my 2001 Toyota Sequoia w/ JBL system. Bought metra 70-8113 wire harness and everything went together easy. Bluetooth connects fast, music plays clear also. Great optioned stereo for the price.
customer_reviews.author: daddygriz

customer_reviews.title: Connection with the phone is easy for use of Bluetooth for music and calls
customer_reviews.text: Installed into my wife's '04 Expedition and she loves it. Connection with the phone is easy for use of Bluetooth for music and calls. The cord for the mic is plenty long so you have options for mounting it. The voice quality is clear on the other end. The in car quality will depend upon your speakers but my wife's stock speakers sounded good. Her friend even commented that the music sounds better just with the change to this head unit.
customer_reviews.author: K2

customer_reviews.title: Tundra upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in a 2000 Toyota Tundra, love the improvement in audio over the OEM radio, the blue tooth functions with my iPhone to provide hands free phone and I can stream my favorite music. Finally brought my truck into the 20th Century for a reasonable cost. The setup is not overly complicated to get the display customized the way I like it, no more so than an iPhone. Recently have noticed when I press the station change that the display dims, hope this doesn't turn into a repair, otherwise a good radio.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality stereo
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a single din Pioneer to this double din. Never looked back! Love the controls, illumination, sound quality, and look of the unit. My only complaint, is that they could have made the LCD a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: In general, I am very pleased with this Receiver. Installation went smoothly. Once it was powered up, it paired easily with my HTC One. Phone and music functions work well. My one real complaint is the one voiced repeatedly. There is no color and brightness setting of the display that allows it to be visible in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: MagnoliaMags

customer_reviews.title: Much better sound than factory stereo
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my 98 4runner SR5 . I've had this stereo installed for around 6 months now. Much better sound than factory stereo, and getting it to match the color of my dash lights was easy. It will enter a dimmed mode when the lights are on. Getting it to pair with a new phone can be confusing. I wouldn't try to navigate through the menus while driving, it can be convoluted, but it's not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Wash

customer_reviews.title: Good feature laden stereo for the price.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned about the wire gauge on the wiring harness. It is a lot thinner than the harness on the Clareion I replaced. But it turned out to be fine, the stereo sounds great. I can not seem to get it to do custom colors though.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Maggi

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her new radio. It some times will not connect her phone but I think its operator error LOL. I just wish the steering wheel controller would work. I tried to hook it up per the little manual they gave me but no luck. (This has nothing to do with this radio)
customer_reviews.author: BLU BLA BLEE

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice system for my 06 Scion tC fits perfectly with the metro ddin multi dash kit. Took me about 10 min to hook up and install and it looks beautiful and give you a little mor control over the speakers as well. The bluetooth function is amazing pulling all your contacts on the display without touching your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Navarro iii

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and versatile headunit
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my 2003 VW Jetta GLS so I could have bluetooth connectivity. I bought a harness to connect the aftermarket headunit to the car. It worked flawlessly upon the first song that I listened to with it; songs sounded much more rich and less distorted, the highs and lows were evenly distributed. I recommend this to anyone who wants an increase in sound quality with bluetooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Severson

customer_reviews.title: looks good. bluetooth functions work well
customer_reviews.text: customized the colors to match vehicle, looks good. bluetooth functions work well, although the mic picks up some extra noise when talking in the car. very happy
customer_reviews.author: MK

product_meta.title: PIONEER FH-X720BT 2-DIN in-Dash CD/USB/MP3 Car Stereo Receiver with Bluetooth
product_meta.description: The FH-X720BT 2-DIN CD receiver features Pioneer's MIXTRAX technology, built-in Bluetooth for hands-free calling and audio streaming, Pandora for iPhone, and direct control of an iPod/iPhone via USB. The multi-line, multi-segmented LCD display with LED backlight is 35% larger than previous models and offers improved visibility and legibility. Customize your sound with a 5-band graphic equalizer, high-pass and low-pass filter settings, and subwoofer control. MIXTRAX is an innovative Pioneer technology that creates a nonstop mix of your music library complete with a range of DJ-inspired effects. Drawing from Pioneer’s rich DJ heritage and our passion for music, MIXTRAX delivers a unique DJ infused listening experience to those in the car. MIXTRAX takes the music from an iPhone, iPod, USB device, or certain Android devices and plays it back with added transitions and effects, creating a virtual DJ inside the Pioneer receiver. Improved Bluetooth! From hands-free calling, wireless audio streaming, simple pairing, and voice recognition, Bluetooth wireless technology has made life in the vehicle much more convenient. This CD receiver with Bluetooth also includes better call quality reception using the new Wideband Speech Handsfree Profile 1.6. Nearly doubling the bandwidth of the frequency helps bring call quality to similar to FM reception. NEW! Automatically connect two phones when in the vehicle to make and receive calls and stream music from both phones. Connect an iPod or iPhone to the FH-X720BT using the optional USB interface cable (CD-IU51 interface cable sold separately) enjoy the music stored on your device. As an added bonus, the FH-X720BT is able to utilize the voice control feature found on your iPhone. With App Mode you can enjoy listening and viewing the content on select compatible apps directly on the receiver's display from a connected iPhone or iPod Touch. Dual Zone Color Customization Illumination.
feature_bullets: Multi-Line, Multi-Segmented LCD Display with LED Backlight (13+4 characters) Built-In MOSFET 50W x 4 Amplifier 2 Sets of RCA Preouts (2V) for System Expansion
5-Band Graphic Equalizer Front USB Port and AUX Input
Advanced Sound Retriever Wired Remote Input

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars638 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
